name: SAKUMA YUKA  Japanese painting Art works

metadata.name: chimera
metadata.description:
The title "Chimère" means "chimera" or "chimera" in French, and also means "delusion" or "dreaming. It depicts a transcendent being that exerts such a sweet charm that it makes the viewer wistfully and anguishedly long to have this child.

This is a Japanese painting.
It is painted with sumi ink and iwa-enogu (mineral pigments made mainly from crushed ore).
All of the coloring and line drawings were done with a brush.

タイトルのシメールはフランス語でキマイラ、キメラの意また、妄想、夢想などの意味を持ちます。この子をどうしても手に入れたいと見る人を切なく苦しくさせるほどの甘い魅力を放つ、人を超越した存在を描いています。

こちらは日本画作品です。
墨や岩絵具(主に鉱石を砕いてつくられた粒子状の絵具で)も用いて描かれています。
彩色も線描きもすべて筆で描かれたものです。

size:4500×3624
date:2019
